nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to disable legacy APIs only after I am confident that all my applications have fully migrated, so I can maintain system stability for users while progressively implementing new features.
cluster_name: Balance Innovation with Legacy API Support
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing API versions, migration workflows, and feature rollouts that ensure system stability and backward compatibility during transitions from legacy to new APIs.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to implement advanced features like smart voice guidance and responsive UI while balancing performance constraints, so that my apps remain accessible and functional across diverse devices used by healthcare providers.
cluster_name: Balance Innovation with Device Compatibility
cluster_description: Functional stories related to designing and implementing advanced app features that optimize performance and maintain accessibility across a variety of hardware devices with different capabilities.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to disable legacy APIs after migration to ensure a streamlined, secure development environment that supports modern coding practices and reduces maintenance complexity.
cluster_name: Disable Legacy APIs Post-Migration
cluster_description: Functional stories focused on deprecating and disabling legacy API endpoints after successful migration, ensuring security, maintainability, and adoption of modern development standards.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to ensure my app complies with usability and accessibility standards so that it effectively serves the diverse needs of older adults and caregivers, while reflecting my commitment to inclusive and user-centered design.
cluster_name: Ensure App Usability and Accessibility Compliance
cluster_description: Functional stories involving design and implementation of app features that meet recognized usability and accessibility standards to serve diverse user groups including older adults and caregivers.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack healthcare app developer, I want to disable legacy APIs after migration and limit proactive voice prompts in a way that aligns with my development goals and respects clinicians’ workflow preferences, so I can deliver innovative, efficient, and user-friendly applications.
cluster_name: Balance Innovation with Workflow Simplicity
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing voice interaction features and API transitions that optimize clinician workflow by minimizing interruptions and complexity while enabling innovation.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to use ALFRED’s API documentation to efficiently develop secure and accessible apps that align with my preference for modern, scalable technologies while ensuring strict privacy compliance and meeting the diverse needs of older adult users.
cluster_name: Use ALFRED API Documentation for Secure Apps
cluster_description: Functional stories related to utilizing ALFRED’s API documentation for developing secure, privacy-compliant, and scalable applications that cater to older adults and healthcare providers.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to ensure my app’s privacy compliance settings are thoroughly verified before submission so that I can maintain user trust, uphold data control principles important to my users, and avoid delays in the approval process.
cluster_name: Verify Privacy Compliance Before App Submission
cluster_description: Functional stories concerning privacy compliance checks, app verification workflows, and submission processes that safeguard user data and ensure adherence to privacy standards prior to app deployment.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is tech-curious and open-minded, I want ALFRED to communicate with me using casual, non-medical language so that I feel comfortable, engaged, and not alienated by formal or technical jargon.
cluster_name: Casual and User-Friendly Communication
cluster_description: Functional stories related to the system’s interaction style, specifically implementing casual, approachable language in communication to enhance user comfort and engagement.

nfus_summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want wearable health devices to be small, simple, and comfortable so they fit naturally into my lifestyle, helping me stay motivated to use them regularly without feeling like I am being controlled or singled out.
cluster_name: Comfortable and Discreet Wearable Health Devices
cluster_description: Functional stories concerning the design, integration, and user interaction of wearable health devices that prioritize comfort, simplicity, and non-stigmatizing appearance.

nfus_summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to start my day by comfortably wearing a small, simple, and lightweight wristband that integrates with ALFRED so I can easily monitor my health while staying independent and feeling in control.
cluster_name: Seamless Wearable Integration and Daily Use
cluster_description: Functional stories that enable smooth daily use and integration of wearable devices with ALFRED to support health monitoring while preserving user independence and comfort.

nfus_summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to control how ALFRED prompts me and adjusts monitoring so that I feel empowered, maintain my independence, and avoid feeling overwhelmed or restricted.
cluster_name: User Control over Health Monitoring and Prompts
cluster_description: Functional stories enabling users to customize, control, and adjust ALFRED’s health monitoring behaviors and notification prompts to suit personal preferences and autonomy.

nfus_summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to have the flexibility to decide when ALFRED can send me health prompts and when I can enjoy spontaneous, uninterrupted moments, so I can maintain control over my daily life without feeling constantly monitored.
cluster_name: Flexible and Respectful Health Prompting
cluster_description: Functional stories related to scheduling, enabling, or disabling health-related notifications and interventions based on user preferences to preserve spontaneity and user autonomy.

nfus_summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to provide helpful support and suggestions in a way that respects my autonomy and does not feel controlling or intrusive, so I can confidently manage my daily life and remain independent.
cluster_name: Non-Intrusive and Autonomy-Respecting Support
cluster_description: Functional stories focused on delivering system support and recommendations that avoid being controlling or intrusive, thus preserving user independence and confidence.

nfus_summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to strictly limit data sharing to essential clinical information only and support formal, no-nonsense communication modes, so that I can respect patient privacy, avoid emotional distractions, and maintain focus during my shifts.
cluster_name: Strict Data Sharing and Formal Communication for Medical Staff
cluster_description: Functional stories related to secure, minimal clinical data sharing and communication modes that are formal and focused to support healthcare professionals’ workflow without distractions.

nfus_summary: As a medical staff user, I want ALFRED to avoid any emotional or playful interactions with patients during my care, so that I can focus strictly on clinical facts and provide professional, distraction-free support.
cluster_name: Professional and Fact-Focused Interaction
cluster_description: Functional stories that ensure ALFRED’s interactions in clinical contexts are strictly professional, factual, and free from emotional or playful elements.

nfus_summary: As a medical staff, I want ALFRED to activate and respond only when I explicitly command it, so that I can maintain focus and avoid any distractions during my busy clinical shifts.
cluster_name: Explicit Command Activation for Clinical Use
cluster_description: Functional stories ensuring ALFRED activates and responds only upon explicit commands from medical staff to minimize distractions during clinical work.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who feels overwhelmed by technology and is concerned about privacy, I want ALFRED to never suggest or activate cognitive games unless I explicitly ask for them, so I can maintain control and avoid stress.
cluster_name: User-Controlled Activation of Cognitive Games
cluster_description: Functional stories related to cognitive games that require explicit user initiation before activation or suggestion, ensuring user control and minimizing stress.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who feels overwhelmed by technology and values privacy, I want ALFRED to activate only when I press the talk button, so I feel in control and avoid any unexpected or intrusive listening.
cluster_name: Push-to-Talk Activation for Privacy Control
cluster_description: Functional stories that implement push-to-talk mechanisms requiring explicit user activation before the system listens or responds, supporting privacy and control.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who prefers formal communication, I want ALFRED to interact with me only in a formal, polite, and straightforward way, avoiding casual or overly friendly language, so that I feel respected and comfortable using the system.
cluster_name: Formal and Polite Communication Style
cluster_description: Functional stories governing ALFRED’s interaction style to maintain formality, politeness, and straightforwardness to match user communication preferences.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who feels overwhelmed by technology and concerned about data privacy, I want ALFRED to activate only when I explicitly press a push-to-talk button and never turn on automatically, so that I can feel safe, maintain full control over when the system listens, and avoid unsolicited interactions.
cluster_name: Strict Push-to-Talk Activation for Privacy
cluster_description: Functional stories implementing strict push-to-talk activation controls that prevent automatic listening or activation, ensuring user privacy and control.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who values privacy and control, I want to ensure ALFRED does not share my cognitive game progress or any related health data without my explicit permission, so I can feel safe and not overwhelmed by unwanted data sharing.
cluster_name: Explicit Consent for Data Sharing in Cognitive Games
cluster_description: Functional stories ensuring that any data sharing related to cognitive games or health data occurs only after explicit user consent.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is cautious about technology and privacy, I want to strictly control and limit the personal and health data ALFRED collects and shares, ensuring that my information is never exposed to unauthorized parties or third parties, so I can feel safe and maintain my privacy on my own terms.
cluster_name: Strict Privacy Control and Minimal Data Sharing
cluster_description: Functional stories related to data collection, storage, and sharing practices that enforce strict user control and minimal exposure of personal and health information.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who prefers formal and polite communication, I want ALFRED to use only strict, no-nonsense language with me so that I feel respected and avoid frustration caused by casual or overly friendly prompts.
cluster_name: Strict Formal Communication
cluster_description: Functional stories enforcing a formal, no-nonsense communication style that avoids casual or overly friendly language to meet user preferences.

nfus_summary: As a retired social worker who is cautious about technology and privacy, I want ALFRED to activate only when I choose and to minimize all notifications, especially reminders and exercise prompts, so I can feel in control and avoid feeling overwhelmed or pressured by the system.
cluster_name: User-Controlled Activation and Minimal Notifications
cluster_description: Functional stories that support user choice for system activation and limit notifications and reminders to prevent user overwhelm.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who values privacy and comfort, I want to avoid video check-ins arranged by my caregiver and prefer offline check-ins instead, so that I feel less pressured and maintain control over my personal interactions.
cluster_name: Preference for Offline Communication over Video Calls
cluster_description: Functional stories enabling offline communication options and avoiding unsolicited or pressured video interactions to maintain user comfort and privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who feels overwhelmed by technology, I want ALFRED to only respond when I explicitly activate it with a push-to-talk command, so that I can maintain control over interactions and feel less dependent on the system.
cluster_name: Explicit Push-to-Talk Response Control
cluster_description: Functional stories enforcing system response only upon explicit push-to-talk activation to maintain user control and reduce dependence.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who values privacy and formality, I want to send only formal and polite messages through ALFRED, avoid almost all notifications, and ensure no sharing of my data, so I can communicate on my own terms while maintaining my dignity and control.
cluster_name: Formal Messaging with Privacy and Notification Control
cluster_description: Functional stories supporting sending formal, polite messages with strict control over notifications and data sharing.

nfus_summary: As a retired social worker who is cautious about technology, I want to engage in cognitively stimulating activities only when I explicitly request them, so that I can maintain formal, low-intrusion mental exercises without unsolicited interruptions or overwhelming prompts.
cluster_name: On-Demand Cognitive Activities with Low Intrusion
cluster_description: Functional stories enabling cognitive activities that start only upon user request and avoid unsolicited prompts or interruptions.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is cautious about technology, I want to block all app installations unless I explicitly request them and limit data sharing strictly to authorized individuals, so that I can protect my privacy and avoid overwhelming or unnecessary notifications.
cluster_name: Strict Control Over App Installations and Data Sharing
cluster_description: Functional stories that enforce user authorization for app installations and restrict data sharing to authorized parties, minimizing unwanted notifications.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is cautious with technology, I want ALFRED to only listen and respond when I push to talk, maintain formal communication at all times, and minimize almost all notifications to protect my privacy and prevent feeling overwhelmed.
cluster_name: Push-to-Talk Activation with Formal Communication and Notification Minimization
cluster_description: Functional stories combining strict push-to-talk listening activation, formal communication style, and minimal notifications to support privacy and reduce user stress.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is cautious and values privacy, I want ALFRED to only respond when I explicitly activate it and to block all unsolicited notifications and app installations, so that I can maintain strict control over my data sharing and avoid feeling overwhelmed or unsafe with technology.
cluster_name: Strict Activation and Blocking of Unsolicited Notifications and Installations
cluster_description: Functional stories enforcing explicit activation controls and blocking unsolicited notifications and app installations to maintain user safety and privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is cautious about technology and values privacy, I want to start cognitive game sessions only when I explicitly ask for them, so I can avoid feeling overwhelmed and keep full control over my interaction with ALFRED.
cluster_name: Explicit User Control of Cognitive Game Sessions
cluster_description: Functional stories ensuring cognitive games begin only upon explicit user initiation, supporting privacy and user control.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is cautious about technology, I want to play cognitive games only when I choose to start them and ensure my personal data remains completely private without any unsolicited notifications, so I can feel secure and not overwhelmed.
cluster_name: Voluntary Cognitive Game Use with Data Privacy and Notification Control
cluster_description: Functional stories that allow cognitive game play only by user choice, with strict privacy protections and suppression of unsolicited notifications.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is very concerned about privacy and feels overwhelmed by technology, I want ALFRED to always ask for my clear and explicit permission before turning on any sensors or sharing any of my data, so I can keep full control and feel safe using the system.
cluster_name: Explicit Consent for Sensor Activation and Data Sharing
cluster_description: Functional stories requiring clear, explicit user permission before activating sensors or sharing any personal data.

nfus_summary: As a retired social worker who is cautious about technology, I want to personally review and explicitly approve every data sharing permission and sensor activation before they happen, so I can keep full control over my privacy and prevent any unwanted exposure of my information.
cluster_name: User Review and Approval of Data Sharing and Sensor Use
cluster_description: Functional stories enabling users to review and explicitly approve all data sharing permissions and sensor activations before they occur.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who feels overwhelmed by technology and values strict privacy, I want ALFRED to only listen and respond when I press a button or explicitly activate it, so I can feel safe and maintain full control over when the system is attentive.
cluster_name: Push-to-Talk Mode on Request for Privacy
cluster_description: Functional stories implementing push-to-talk mode that requires explicit user activation for listening and responding.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is very concerned about privacy, I want to be able to review and explicitly approve any data sharing or sensor activation beforehand, so that I feel fully in control and safe while using ALFRED.
cluster_name: Pre-Approval Control of Data Sharing and Sensors
cluster_description: Functional stories focused on user review and explicit approval processes for any data sharing or sensor activation before execution.

nfus_summary: As a difficult and privacy-conscious older adult, I want to explicitly approve every instance of data sharing and sensor activation to ensure I maintain full control over my personal information and avoid feeling overwhelmed or unsafe with technology.
cluster_name: Strict User Approval for All Data and Sensor Activities
cluster_description: Functional stories requiring explicit user approval for every data sharing and sensor activation event to maximize privacy and control.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is cautious about technology and privacy, I want ALFRED to provide concise and straightforward information about what data is collected and who can see it, so I can maintain strict control over my personal information without feeling overwhelmed.
cluster_name: Transparent and Concise Data Handling Reports
cluster_description: Functional stories providing users with clear, concise, and understandable reports on data collection and access to support informed privacy control.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is very concerned about privacy, I want to explicitly approve any data sharing and sensor use before it happens, so that I can maintain full control over my personal information and feel secure using ALFRED.
cluster_name: Explicit Pre-Approval of Data Sharing and Sensor Use
cluster_description: Functional stories requiring user explicit approval prior to any data sharing or sensor activation to ensure security and control.

nfus_summary: As a retired social worker who is cautious about technology, I want ALFRED to monitor me only when I explicitly ask for it, so I can maintain my privacy, avoid feeling constantly watched, and keep control over my personal data.
cluster_name: User-Initiated Monitoring Only
cluster_description: Functional stories that enable system monitoring of users only upon explicit user request to preserve privacy and prevent feelings of constant surveillance.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who feels overwhelmed by technology and is very concerned about data privacy, I want ALFRED to always ask for my explicit consent before using any sensors or sharing any of my data, so I can keep full control over my privacy and feel safe.
cluster_name: Always Explicit Consent for Sensor Use and Data Sharing
cluster_description: Functional stories enforcing that explicit user consent is obtained every time sensors are activated or data is shared to maintain privacy and user safety.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who values privacy and prefers formal, limited communication, I want to avoid system-mediated interactions like video calls or instant messages, so that I can feel safe from unwanted digital intrusions and maintain control over my personal data.
cluster_name: Avoidance of System-Mediated Communication
cluster_description: Functional stories that limit or disable system-mediated communication methods such as video calls and instant messaging to protect user privacy and comfort.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who values strict privacy, I want to ensure that my personal health data is never shared with medical staff or anyone else without my explicit permission, so I can maintain control over my information and feel safe using ALFRED.
cluster_name: Strict User-Controlled Health Data Sharing
cluster_description: Functional stories enforcing that personal health data is only shared with explicit user permission to maintain strict privacy controls.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who values formal, polite, and transactional language, I want ALFRED to interact with me using strictly respectful and controlled communication, avoiding casual or familiar tones that make me uncomfortable.
cluster_name: Strictly Formal and Polite Interaction Style
cluster_description: Functional stories implementing system communication that is strictly formal, respectful, and avoids casual or familiar language to align with user preferences.

nfus_summary: As an older person who values formal, polite, and ethical communication, I want ALFRED to keep all interactions strictly formal without casual familiarity, even if it feels cold, so that I feel respected and maintain my dignity despite occasional feelings of isolation.
cluster_name: Strict Formality in Social Inclusion Communication
cluster_description: Functional stories ensuring all social interaction features maintain a strictly formal and polite tone, avoiding casual familiarity to uphold dignity.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is very concerned about privacy, I want to have full control over what recovery data ALFRED collects and ensure that nothing is shared without my explicit permission, so I can maintain my autonomy and avoid feeling monitored or exposed.
cluster_name: Full User Control over Recovery Data Collection and Sharing
cluster_description: Functional stories allowing users to control recovery data collection and strictly regulate sharing with explicit permission to preserve autonomy.

nfus_summary: As a difficult and privacy-conscious older adult, I want ALFRED to respond only when I explicitly activate it using push-to-talk and to limit almost all notifications, so I can maintain strict control over my interactions without feeling overwhelmed or invaded by constant interruptions.
cluster_name: Push-to-Talk Activation with Strict Notification Limitation
cluster_description: Functional stories enforcing push-to-talk interaction activation and minimal notifications to avoid overwhelming privacy-conscious users.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is cautious about privacy and easily overwhelmed by technology, I want ALFRED to activate only when I ask it to and to minimize nearly all notifications and reminders, so I can keep strict control over my interactions and avoid feeling intruded upon or stressed.
cluster_name: Strict Activation Control and Notification Minimization
cluster_description: Functional stories allowing activation only on explicit user request and minimizing notifications to reduce stress and intrusion.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who prefers to control technology carefully, I want ALFRED to respond only when I explicitly activate it using push-to-talk, so I can avoid unsolicited interruptions and maintain my privacy and autonomy.
cluster_name: Controlled Push-to-Talk Activation to Prevent Interruptions
cluster_description: Functional stories ensuring ALFRED responds exclusively to explicit push-to-talk activations to prevent unsolicited interruptions.

nfus_summary: As a retired social worker who is cautious about technology, I want ALFRED to respond only when I explicitly activate it by push-to-talk, so that I can avoid unsolicited interruptions and feel safe and fully in control of my interactions.
cluster_name: Push-to-Talk Activation for Safe and Controlled Interactions
cluster_description: Functional stories that require explicit push-to-talk activation for system responses to ensure user safety and interaction control.

nfus_summary: As a retired social worker who is cautious about technology, I want to block all app installations unless I explicitly approve them and strictly limit data sharing to avoid unsolicited notifications and ensure my privacy is fully protected.
cluster_name: User-Approved App Installations and Data Sharing Restrictions
cluster_description: Functional stories that block app installations without explicit user approval and enforce strict limitations on data sharing to protect privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older adult who is cautious about privacy and technology, I want ALFRED to respond only when I explicitly give voice commands, so that I can maintain full control and avoid feeling overwhelmed or having my privacy invaded.
cluster_name: Explicit Voice Command Activation for Privacy Control
cluster_description: Functional stories implementing system response only upon explicit voice commands to maintain user privacy and control.
